feature.label: Cyface Nodes
feature.description:
The Cyface KNIME Nodes add functionality with a focus on time series analysis and geo information processing.
These nodes are supported by NodePit (https://nodepit.com). Do you have feedback, questions, comments or want to support KNIME node development at Cyface? Then send us an email to mail@cyface.de!
feature.copyright: The Cyface KNIME Nodes are nodes developed and maintained by the Cyface GmbH. https://cyface.de
feature.license: The Cyface KNIME Nodes are availabel under the GNU General Public License Version 3.
